attributes.action: Open the United Kingdom  at March 2021
attributes.additional_details: Everyone want to be social, we tired about corona virus.
attributes.background: Open the country soon. Let’s kids go to school. Open all bars restaurants and allowed people to go to work.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government has published a roadmap out of lockdown for Spring 2021. See:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-response-spring-2021/covid-19-response-spring-2021-summary

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or calling for specific changes to the roadmap, if there are changes you'd like to see.
